mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_Daily_Stat_Agency(
) SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Stat_Dt, TP.Customer_ID, Product_ID, Product_Price_Seq, TP.Bottle_Own_Count, TP.Bottle_Rent_Count,'admin', now() FROM TB_Customer_Product TP, TB_Customer TC WHERE TC.Agency_YN = 'Y' AND TP.Customer_ID = TC.Customer_ID AND (TP.Bottle_Own_Count >0 || TP.Bottle_Rent_Count >0 )

INSERT INTO TB_Monthly_Stat_Agency(
) SELECT LEFT(Stat_Dt,7) , Customer_ID , Product_ID , Product_Price_Seq , SUM(Bottle_Own_Count) , SUM(Bottle_Rent_Count) , 'admin' , NOW() FROM TB_Daily_Stat_Agency WHERE LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m') GROUP BY Product_ID,LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)
mapper.select: SELECT sa.Customer_ID, tc.Customer_Nm FROM TB_Daily_Stat_Agency sa, TB_Customer tc WHERE sa.Customer_Id = tc.Customer_ID AND sa.Stat_Dt = #{searchStatDt} GROUP BY sa.Customer_ID

SELECT sa.Product_ID, sa.Product_Price_Seq , tp.Product_Nm, pp.Product_Capa FROM TB_Daily_Stat_Agency sa,TB_Product tp, TB_Product_Price pp WHERE sa.Product_ID = tp.Product_ID AND sa.Product_ID = pp.Product_ID AND sa.Product_Price_Seq = pp.Product_Price_Seq AND sa.Stat_Dt = #{searchStatDt} GROUP by sa.Product_ID, sa.Product_Price_Seq

SELECT Stat_Dt , sa.Customer_ID , sa.Product_ID , sa.Product_Price_Seq , sa.Bottle_Own_Count , sa.Bottle_Rent_Count FROM TB_Daily_Stat_Agency sa WHERE sa.Stat_Dt = #{searchStatDt} Order By sa.Product_ID , sa.Product_Price_Seq

SELECT Stat_Dt , sa.Customer_ID , sa.Product_ID , sa.Product_Price_Seq , sa.Bottle_Own_Count , sa.Bottle_Rent_Count FROM TB_Monthly_Stat_Agency sa WHERE sa.Stat_Dt = #{searchStatDt} Order By sa.Product_ID , sa.Product_Price_Seq

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(curdate(),'%Y/%m/%d') Stat_Dt, TP.Customer_ID, Product_ID, Product_Price_Seq, TP.Bottle_Own_Count, TP.Bottle_Rent_Count FROM TB_Customer_Product TP, TB_Customer TC WHERE TC.Agency_YN = 'Y' AND TP.Customer_ID = TC.Customer_ID AND (TP.Bottle_Own_Count+TP.Bottle_Rent_Count !=0 )

SELECT TP.Customer_ID, TC.Customer_Nm FROM TB_Customer_Product TP, TB_Customer TC WHERE TC.Agency_YN = 'Y' AND TP.Customer_ID = TC.Customer_ID AND (TP.Bottle_Own_Count + TP.Bottle_Rent_Count !=0 ) GROUP By TP.Customer_ID

SELECT TCP.Product_ID, TCP.Product_Price_Seq , tp.Product_Nm, pp.Product_Capa FROM TB_Customer_Product TCP, TB_Customer TC, TB_Product tp, TB_Product_Price pp WHERE TC.Agency_YN = 'Y' AND TCP.Customer_ID = TC.Customer_ID and TCP.Product_ID = tp.Product_ID AND TCP.Product_ID = pp.Product_ID AND TCP.Product_Price_Seq = pp.Product_Price_Seq AND (TCP.Bottle_Own_Count + TCP.Bottle_Rent_Count !=0 ) GROUP by TCP.Product_ID, TCP.Product_Price_Seq
